version_description:
- Bug fix for iOS 9.1
On first use of NINE new items were being saved but not displayed until the app was restarted. This has been fixed.

- Added 'Settings'
Added a setting to allow users to save photos to camera roll as well as within NINE.

- Added 'Open in maps'
You can now open maps from your item to get directions etc.

- Bug fix for iOS 9.1
On first use of NINE new items were being saved but not displayed until the app was restarted. This has been fixed.

- Added 'Settings'
Added a setting to allow users to save photos to camera roll as well as within NINE.

- Added 'Open in maps'
You can now open maps from your item to get directions etc.

- Bug fix for iOS 9.1
On first use of NINE new items were being saved but not displayed until the app was restarted. This has been fixed.

- Added 'Settings'
Added a setting to allow users to save photos to camera roll as well as within NINE.

- Added 'Open in maps'
You can now open maps from your item to get directions etc.

- Bug fix for iOS 9.1
On first use of NINE new items were being saved but not displayed until the app was restarted. This has been fixed.

- Added 'Settings'
Added a setting to allow users to save photos to camera roll as well as within NINE.

- Added 'Open in maps'
You can now open maps from your item to get directions etc.

- Added Spanish, German and Chinese (Simplified) Versions
We have added translations for these languages - please let us know via our support email if you feel any translations are incorrect or need amended! We are in the process of doing Italian, Slovenian and French. Get in touch if you are looking for NINE in your language (or can help!).

- Renamed 'Archive'
Archived is now your 'Completed' list. Makes more sense right?

- Updated icons
The icons are a little more consistent - and we have changed 'Make' to a science beaker. Just because :-)

- Reduced app size
We have optimised our app to be as small as possible on your device.

- Coming soon...
We will be sending out a survey to all of our NINE users in the coming months to pick their next feature... will it be reminders, 3D Touch, online lists, Apple Watch app... You will decide!

- Coming soon...
We will be sending out a survey to all of our NINE users in the coming months to pick their next feature... will it be reminders, 3D Touch, online lists, Apple Watch app... You will decide!

- Set Reminders!
Our most requested feature. Now you can add a repeating reminder to an item.

- Italian Translation
NINE is now available in Italian thanks to Matia Gobbo. He also makes sexy interfaces and tasty honey... Just saying.

- Updated Chinese (simplified) translation
We have improved our Chinese translation with the help of Kyle Ming. Thanks Kyle!

- Returned our app name to 'NINE' worldwide

- Full Rebuild - NINE 2.0 now lets you capture even more details, create lists, search for items online and provides a light and dark mode.
- Removed 'search online' when no label or barcode.
